meanings.sent1: Her aloneness in the forest made her feel peaceful.
meanings.sent2: Sometimes, aloneness can be a time for self-reflection.
meanings.sent3: The cat's aloneness in the empty house led to some mischievous adventures.
meanings.sent4: The aloneness of the old tree on the hill spoke of years of solitude.
meanings.sent5: The aloneness of the desert at night was both eerie and beautiful.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being solitary.
meanings.sent1: His aloneness at the top of the mountain filled him with a sense of achievement.
meanings.sent2: The aloneness of the lighthouse keeper was a choice he made for peace.
meanings.sent3: The aloneness of the last cookie in the jar tempted the hungry child.
meanings.sent4: The aloneness of the lone wolf symbolized strength and independence.
meanings.sent5: The aloneness of the moon in the night sky captivated the poet's heart.
